title: Change the next value for sequences
sql:
create sequence seq start with 9;

select seq.nextval                NEXTVAL
from   dual;                   ----------
                                        9 

alter sequence seq restart;

select seq.nextval                NEXTVAL
from   dual;                   ----------
                                        1 

alter sequence seq restart start with 42;

select seq.nextval                NEXTVAL
from   dual;                   ----------
                                       42

explanations.text: You can specify any number as the starting point when resettting
Reset the sequence to its minimum value (1 by default)
